footer.text: Character Guide • Synergy: Mona | Update Date: 01/27/2023 | Editor: Samantha#9907

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value:
Anemo Flex should have someone capable of grouping, Cryo Flex should be a Battery such as Diona.
Sadly, Omen isn't as synergetic as we'd like with Bloom-based reactions.
